  8. #ifndef _NGX_EVENT_TIMER_H_INCLUDED_
  9. ‌#define _NGX_EVENT_TIMER_H_INCLUDED_


  12. #include <ngx_config.h>
  13. #include <ngx_core.h>
  14. #include <ngx_event.h>


  17. ‌#define NGX_TIMER_INFINITE  (ngx_msec_t) -1

  19. ‌#define NGX_TIMER_LAZY_DELAY  300


  22. ngx_int_t ngx_event_timer_init(ngx_log_t *log);
  23. ngx_msec_t ngx_event_find_timer(void);
  24. void ngx_event_expire_timers(void);
  25. void ngx_event_cancel_timers(void);


  28. #if (NGX_DTRACE)
  29. void ngx_event_probe_timer_add_helper(ngx_event_t *ev,
  30.     ngx_msec_t timer);
  31. void ngx_event_probe_timer_del_helper(ngx_event_t *ev);
  32. #endif


  35. extern ngx_rbtree_t  ngx_event_timer_rbtree;


  38. static ngx_inline void
  39. ‌ngx_event_del_timer(ngx_event_t *ev)
  40. {
  41. #if (NGX_DTRACE)
  42.     ngx_event_probe_timer_del_helper(ev);
  43. #endif

  45.     ngx_log_debug2(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_EVENT, ev->log, 0,
  46.                    "event timer del: %d: %M",
  47.                     ngx_event_ident(ev->data), ev->timer.key);

  49.     ngx_rbtree_delete(&ngx_event_timer_rbtree, &ev->timer);

  51. #if (NGX_DEBUG)
  52.     ev->timer.left = NULL;
  53.     ev->timer.right = NULL;
  54.     ev->timer.parent = NULL;
  55. #endif

  57.     ev->timer_set = 0;
  58. }


  61. static ngx_inline void
  62. ‌ngx_event_add_timer(ngx_event_t *ev, ngx_msec_t timer)
  63. {
  64.     ngx_msec_t      key;
  65.     ngx_msec_int_t  diff;

  67.     key = ngx_current_msec + timer;

  69.     if (ev->timer_set) {

  71.         /*
  72.          * Use a previous timer value if difference between it and a new
  73.          * value is less than NGX_TIMER_LAZY_DELAY milliseconds: this allows
  74.          * to minimize the rbtree operations for fast connections.
  75.          */

  77.         diff = (ngx_msec_int_t) (key - ev->timer.key);

  79.         if (ngx_abs(diff) < NGX_TIMER_LAZY_DELAY) {
  80.             ngx_log_debug3(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_EVENT, ev->log, 0,
  81.                            "event timer: %d, old: %M, new: %M",
  82.                             ngx_event_ident(ev->data), ev->timer.key, key);
  83.             return;
  84.         }

  86.         ngx_del_timer(ev);
  87.     }

  89.     ev->timer.key = key;

  91. #if (NGX_DTRACE)
  92.     ngx_event_probe_timer_add_helper(ev, timer);
  93. #endif

  95.     ngx_log_debug3(NGX_LOG_DEBUG_EVENT, ev->log, 0,
  96.                    "event timer add: %d: %M:%M",
  97.                     ngx_event_ident(ev->data), timer, ev->timer.key);

  99.     ngx_rbtree_insert(&ngx_event_timer_rbtree, &ev->timer);

  101.     ev->timer_set = 1;
  102. }


  105. #endif /* _NGX_EVENT_TIMER_H_INCLUDED_ */
